name: Exovoid
description:
EPIC MEGAJAM Game Submision! Team Name: 

Victor Martinez (Solo Developer)

GAMEPLAY INSTRUCTIONS:

Only Playable in VR!

VR Controls:

Right and left hand grip: Grab Objects

Right and left hand trigger: Shoot SpacePistol if held

Right hand Thumbstick Forward/backwards: Teleport

Left hand Thumbstick Left and right: Snap Rotate Player

Note:

-Left hand has In-World UI with relevant information.

-Game can be played sitting or standing, but after it starts, it's not advisable to switch

-Pistol can be held and attached to either hand without dropping it, to switch, you just need to grab the weapon from one hand with the other.

-Game might inmediately crash the first time it's opened, just close it and try again and it will work. (Crash also happens with a clean UE4.27 VR template build so it's not caused by project content)

What platform is your game built for?

Windows PC - VR Required.

LORE:

You are one of the Warriors Fighting for Space and Reality itself in this VR Puzzle/shooter platformer where you need to create your own Space bubbles in the Nothingness of the Void  by using a special pistol. But be careful! Your pistol can run out of Space in it and then you need to wait for it to recharge space!  

Your enemy: The void, the absolute nothingness voided of all existence. 

Wizards and Scientist alike knew the void was going to attack our universe seeking to wipe space-time and existence.  So they made especial exoskeleton suits, weapons and tools to fight the void. You are one of the warriors that they trained for this mission.

Your mission: Recover Dimensional Crystals from enemy "Voiderritory" and use them to bring existence back to those voided areas of the Universe.

GAMEPLAY Description: 

Using your SpacePistol, you can create Spheres of Existence in the Void territory, however these "SpaceSpheres" can only exist for a short amount of time, so you need to create and teleport to the next one before the one you currently are shrinks out of existence.  The pistol that creates space needs time to recharge after you have fired, so manage your space correctly, avoid making the Pistol run out of space, and remain calm while the SpaceSphere you currently are gets smaller and smaller leaving you no room inside it and making you create another one. 

Make sure to recover the most amount of Dimensional Crystals that you can, as Headquarters need them desperately to keep fighting the Void.
